  • Reference

Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes

Source: R/CalculateWangSimilarity.R
CalculateWangSimilarity.Rd

Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes as described in James Z. Wang, Zhidian Du, Rapeeporn Payattakool, Philip S. Yu, Chin-Fu Chen, A new method to measure the semantic similarity of GO terms, Bioinformatics, Volume 23, Issue 10, 15 May 2007, Pages 1274–1281, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btm087

Usage

CalculateWangSimilarity(
  OrgDb,
  keytype = "ENTREZID",
  ont = "BP",
  genes = NULL,
  dropCodes = NULL,
  minIC = NULL
)

Arguments

OrgDb

OrgDb object

keytype

keytype to select records from OrgDb. All possible keys are returned by using the keys method.

ont

Type of ontology to be used. One of 'BP', 'MF', 'CC'. Defaults to BP.

genes

List of genes for which to calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between them. Defaults to NULL (use all annotated genes)

dropCodes

List of codes of annotation evidence types. Annotations with this codes will be dropped before calculating similiarity. Defaults to NULL, including all annotations.

minIC

Minimum term information content 'IC' to take into account. Terms with less IC won't be used for calculations. Defaults to NULL

Value

A matrix of pairwise gene similarities
